alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 07 at 10:18AM CST until January 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Sargent and Ransom Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing.
